name: Panda
description: A rebuild on my site to newer versions of JS, code is shorter and easier to read.  The project name is just a random word-pair.  There is no execute script here as this code is integated into another project.   I wrote all the tests in src/tests before I executed this code.  I have imported the CSS to this project likewise.

scripts.# comment line 1: On every new machine, please run tools/checksum.bash first, this adds files that don't touch the repo.
scripts.test: export NODE_ENV=development; node ./node_modules/.bin/vitest --typecheck run; if [ ! -d './dist/tests' ]; then echo 'Run build:test first'; else export NODE_ENV=development; node ./tools/tests-browser.mjs; fi
scripts.#ignore-lint-notes: 1 function is over complexity by 1 point. . .  && Its an arbitary limit
scripts.lint: node ./node_modules/.bin/eslint --exit-on-fatal-error --fix --no-cache ./src/*ts;  node ./node_modules/.bin/eslint --exit-on-fatal-error --fix --no-cache src/tests/*; node ./node_modules/.bin/eslint --exit-on-fatal-error --fix --no-cache tools/*; node ./node_modules/.bin/prettier --write ./src; node ./node_modules/.bin/prettier --write ./tools/; git checkout src/fixtures/*mjs;
scripts.build:docs: if [ ! -d './dist/docs' ]; then mkdir -p ./dist/docs; fi; node ./node_modules/.bin/typedoc --options ./typedoc.json --emit both --logLevel 3
scripts.#ignore-this-line: Edit values in this simple script if you have local security policy
scripts.#ignore-this-line2: NOTE: 'build:docs' after 'build' and 'test:web', as they purge the dist directory
scripts.docs: if [ ! -d ./dist/docs ]; then echo 'Build docs first'; else; node ./tools/doc-server.mjs & fi
scripts.test:web: if [ ! -d './dist/tests' ]; then echo 'Run build:test first'; else echo 'If running manually, use CLI flags'; export NODE_ENV=development; node ./tools/tests-browser.mjs; fi
scripts.#ignore-this-line3: the following CSS code is the older solution that doesn't give me what I wanted as the CSS units are evaulated
scripts.build:extract-css: export NODE_ENV=production; node ./node_modules/.bin/vite --config ./vite.config.lib.ts build; node ./node_modules/.bin/vite --config ./vite.config.tests.ts build tools/test-browser.ts;
scripts.#ignore-this-line4: if you use the previous commend, this is how to exec it
